comment.author: 43854658@N00
comment._content: The beautiful Carmel Mission church has appeared on more than one US Postage stamp over the years. The US Postal Service issued a $18.95 Express Mail definitive stamp in February, 2012. The illustration features the dome-shaped bell tower and the elaborate star-shaped window of the Mission San Carlos Borroméo del Río Carmelo. (Scott 4650) A 6¢ commemorative stamp "California Settlement" also featuring the bell tower of the Carmel Mission was issued by the Post Office Department in July, 1969. The stamp marked the 200th anniversary of the settlement of California as well as the bicentennial of the city of San Diego. (Scott 1373).                                                 Carmel Mission                                   California Settlement
